id.source: Derived from firm name per schema rules

name.source: Management Consulted profile page, official website

type.source: Industry classification - McKinsey is one of the three MBB firms
type.notes: McKinsey is definitionally MBB (McKinsey, BCG, Bain)

tagline.value: The most prestigious name in strategy consulting with unmatched brand recognition and Fortune 500 CEO alumni network
tagline.source: Synthesized from Management Consulted description and industry knowledge
tagline.notes: Original tagline written for student context based on firm reputation

headquarters.notes: Headquarters at 55 East 52nd Street, New York, NY 10022

founded.notes: Founded in 1926, modern form emerged in 1939

employees.notes: Global headcount as of recent data

offices.source: Management Consulted office list (North America section)
offices.notes: US offices only, excluding Canadian cities (Montreal, Toronto, Vancouver, Calgary)

regions.notes: McKinsey has 130 offices worldwide across all major regions

industries.source: Web search results from mckinsey.com/industries and firm overview sources
industries.notes: McKinsey has ~22 formal industry practices covering all major sectors

known_for.value: Unmatched brand prestige as the original modern management consultancy, founder of the case interview method, renowned for analytical rigor and producing Fortune 500 CEOs. Known for its 'up or out' promotion culture and prestigious alumni network including Sheryl Sandberg, James Gorman, and Lou Gerstner.
known_for.source: Management Consulted profile and industry knowledge
known_for.notes: Synthesized from multiple sources highlighting firm's distinctive reputation

hires_ug.source: Management Consulted - Business Analyst position listed
hires_ug.notes: Actively recruits undergraduates for Business Analyst role

hires_mba.source: Management Consulted - Associate position and MBA salary data listed
hires_mba.notes: Major MBA recruiter with dedicated Associate role

career_path.value: Business Analyst → Associate → Engagement Manager → Associate Principal → Partner → Senior Partner
career_path.notes: Standard McKinsey progression with 'up or out' policy

travel.source: Industry standard for MBB strategy consulting
travel.notes: Typically 4-5 days per week at client site for most engagements

signing.notes: Signing bonus around $5,000 for undergraduate hires

process.value: Application → McKinsey Solve Game → First Round (2 interviews, 60 min each) → Final Round (2-4 interviews, 40-60 min each) → Offer
process.notes: Standard process includes digital assessment before interviews

unique.value: McKinsey Solve digital assessment (gamified problem-solving game) required for nearly all candidates before interviews. Interviewer-led case format. Pass rate under 20% for Solve Game. Known for rigorous analytical problem-solving focus.
unique.notes: Solve Game (formerly Imbellus) is distinctive to McKinsey's process

timeline.value: On-cycle recruiting happens in fall with offers for summer/fall start dates. Entire process takes 5-8 weeks from application to offer. Final round typically occurs 1-2 weeks after first round.
timeline.notes: Timeline for undergraduate and MBA recruiting cycles

careers.notes: Direct link to job search page

linkedin_alumni.source: LinkedIn BYU alumni search per schema pattern
linkedin_alumni.notes: Direct link to BYU alumni working at McKinsey

pipeline.source: Inferred from LinkedIn data showing 40 current BYU alumni but no evidence of on-campus recruiting
pipeline.notes: McKinsey does not actively recruit on BYU campus but has strong alumni network for referrals

alumni_all_time.notes: Total BYU alumni who have ever worked at McKinsey (current + former)

alumni_current.source: LinkedIn BYU alumni search - 'Where they work' section showing 40 at McKinsey & Company
alumni_current.notes: Current BYU alumni employed at McKinsey as of January 2026

tip.value: Focus on Salt Lake City and Denver offices which have stronger BYU alumni presence. Network with 40+ current BYU alumni at McKinsey through LinkedIn. Strong preparation for McKinsey Solve Game is essential as pass rate is under 20%.
tip.source: Synthesized from LinkedIn location data and recruiting process research
tip.notes: Geographic proximity and alumni concentration suggest SLC/Denver as strategic targets for BYU students

notes: Comprehensive data collected from Management Consulted profile, LinkedIn alumni search, and multiple salary/recruiting sources. All required fields populated with high-confidence data. McKinsey is one of the most well-documented consulting firms with extensive public information available.
